metadata.title: CVE-2023-4244 linux
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tables component can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation.  Due to a race condition between nf_tables netlink control plane transaction and nft_set element garbage collection, it is possible to underflow the reference counter causing a use-after-free vulnerability.  We recommend upgrading past commit 3e91b0ebd994635df2346353322ac51ce84ce6d8.
